DarkMouse::
 She smirked. "I've been to the matrix and back once. I'm not 
planning on going again. But if you don't want me on the bridge, I 
will need the computer terminal here in your room. May I?" She pulled 
up a chair and sat down. She started to work on the computer console 
and switched most of the base operations from the bridge to her 
computer.  "OK, I got this set up. I won't need to go to the bridge. 
I'll just sit right here."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Oh, THAT one.
> 
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest frowns. "The bridge is probably going to get very violent 
> very soon. Are you sure you can handle it there?"
> 
> 
>
